name: Keep Me In The Dark
description:
Created over the span of 2 weeks for a game jam, Keep Me In the Dark is a first person horror game where you must escape the cell of a dungeon by solving puzzles. Be careful though, something lurks in the light. Find dark cells to hide from a mysterious shadow creature. Sometimes it's best to be left in the dark.

This is a game that I've wanted to make for a while. The original concept was in 2D, but I decided to try to make it in 3D. This is a prototype for a potential full game in the future. If you like the concept, let me know in the comments below. If you don't like it, let me know in the comments below. If you have any input, you know what to do. 

--Controls--

WASD/Arrow keys- move

Mouse - look around

E- Interact

Escape- pause

--Due to time constraints, there is some audio and visual polish that I wasn't able to incorporate.
